review.author: DevOps + Frontend
findings: hm-sms.js: raw HTTPS POST to Twilio, Basic Auth, env-driven config, no cred leaks in output
sms-poller.js: timestamp + bounded SID set (50) dedup, pollTimer.unref(), graceful stop clears all state
hivemind-app.js: poller starts after comms, stops on shutdown, injects via sendDirectMessage to pane 1
index.html: Twilio fields in collapsible dropdown, SID/auth=password, phones=text, IDs match JS refs
api-keys.js: load/save/clear for 4 Twilio fields, toggle handler with cleanup
settings-handlers.js: 4 keys added to get/set, validators (AC prefix, + prefix)
Cross-file env var names consistent across all modules

_docs.rule: If change_type !== 'routine', reviewer model MUST differ from author model
_docs.workflow: 1. Author fills author+author_model+change_type. 2. Reviewer fills reviewer+model+result+findings. 3. Pre-commit checks result=approved and cross-model rule. 4. After commit, review.json is reset to pending.
